t: Amazon Trade-In: Get Paid for Your Used Items
s: Amazon accepts a wide variety of electronics for trade-in. This includes eligible Amazon devices, as well as eligible devices from various other brands, including smartphones, tablets, and video games.

t: Create a Trade-In - Amazon Customer Service
s: Create a Trade-In order to exchange Amazon Devices and other eligible electronics, video games, cell phones, and more. Eligible Trade-In orders receive an Amazon.com Gift Card and limited-time promotional discount towards the purchase of a qualifying Amazon Device.

t: The Amazon Trade-In Program - Amazon Customer Service
s: The Amazon Trade-In program allows you to exchange eligible Trade-In items for an Amazon.com Gift Card for the assessed value of the Trade-In. For more details about payments for Trade-Ins, go to Receiving Payment for a Trade-In.

t: Amazon Trade-in gives new life to old devices. Here’s how the program works.
s: April 10, 2024 - With Amazon Trade-in, we refurbish or recycle your old devices, and you receive a digital gift card, plus an additional promotional discount if eligible.
